programme.title: Silent Night, Deadly Night: Part 2
programme.desc: The now-adult Ricky talks to a psychiatrist about how he became a murderer after his brother, Billy, died, which leads back to Mother Superior.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: Deathcember
programme.desc: A collection of 24 films that take a look at the dark side of the festive season from international directors with the most diverse ideas and styles.

programme.title: Silent Night, Deadly Night: Part 2
programme.desc: The now-adult Ricky talks to a psychiatrist about how he became a murderer after his brother, Billy, died, which leads back to Mother Superior.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: I Eat Your Skin
programme.desc: While hosting "I Eat Your Skin," Elvira complains that there's no actual flesh eating in the film, so she invents the I Eat Your Skin Diet.

programme.title: Undead (2003)
programme.desc: A quaint fishing village is overcome by meteorites that turn its residents into the undead.

programme.title: Camp Cold Brook
programme.desc: In a last-ditch effort to spark ratings for his failing show, reality TV host Jack Wilson films his next episode at the infamous Camp Cold Brook, which was host to a horrific incident.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A deaf and mute writer who retreated into the woods to live a solitary life must fight for her life when killer appears at her window.

programme.title: MST3K: The Incredibly Strange Creatures Who Stopped Living And Became Mixed-Up Zombies
programme.desc: A couple of slackers stumble across a cult of monsters at a carnival and becomes a killing zombie.

programme.title: Humanoids from the Deep
programme.desc: A fisherman (Doug McClure) and a scientist (Ann Turkel) fight back when mossy sea monsters assault women.

programme.title: Sorority House Massacre
programme.desc: College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.

programme.title: Deadly Hero
programme.desc: A crazed New York policeman kills a creep to save a cellist, then terrorizes the cellist.

programme.title: Galaxy of Terror
programme.desc: Neurotic astronauts (Edward Albert, Erin Moran, Ray Walston) face a giant worm and other monsters on a distant planet.

programme.title: Countess Dracula
programme.desc: Elderly widow Countess Elisabeth Bathory maintains her misleading youthful appearance by bathing in the blood of virgins.
